itunes:title: #325 - Diversifying Your Revenue with Physical Products with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot
title: #325 - Diversifying Your Revenue with Physical Products with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot
description:
As business owners, the spaces we create and make money in continue to evolve and change. In order to find success, entrepreneurs are required to pivot, adjust, and keep building their dream work and life. In this episode, Emily is joined by Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot to discuss the creation of the new Biddy Tarot deck and the evolution of entrepreneurship in the digital age. They also talk about what it looks like to diversify your revenue streams and business offerings as your business evolves.

Get full shownotes for this episode here >>

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
